duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support for classroom audio/visual setup and general problem resolution, including support for Windows OS, Mac OS, and Mobile Devices.
Complete audiovisual presentation set-ups in various settings, troubleshoot issues with AV systems, and provide instruction to faculty and staff.
Act as a Video Production Manager, shooter, and editor for live events, including load in, rehearsals, production, and load out.
Produce videos for Booth, including shooting, scripting, green screen production, editing, and distribution, as well as managing high visibility Zoom Webinars.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related technical area required (Master's preferred)
